## isNaN\_2() function

Checks if value is NaN.

Note: This method is not the same as isNaN which returns true for undefined and other non-numeric values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isNaN: (value?: any) => boolean
```

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

value


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The value to check.  Returns true if value is NaN, else false.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean
